Description:
I/131221/AL/MG01, 312147446 - You have failed to appoint one or more competent persons to assist you in undertaking the measures needed to comply with all relevant statuatory provisions with regards to the health, safety and welfare of your employees, including but not limited to, the control of hazardous substances at your premises.

 I/131221/AL/MG02, 312147712 - You have failed to ensure that your employees' exposure to water-mix metalworking fluid mist, a substance hazardous to health, inhalation of which can cause asthma and occupational hypersensitivity pneumonitis, has been eliminated or adequately controlled as no local exhaust ventilation is provided on your CNC machines.

I/131221/AL/MG03, 312147726 -  You have failed to carry out a suitable and sufficient assessment of the risk to the health of your employees from work with hazardous substances, namely hydrofluoric acid, orthophosphoric acid, chromium trioxide and sodium hydroxide, on your pre-treatment line.

 I/131221/AL/MG04, 312147747 - You have failed to ensure that your local exhaust ventilation systems, including the Niederman mobile extraction unit and the water-backed spray booth, have been thoroughly examined and tested by a competent person in the last 14 months.
